about_the_game:
" This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Fantasy Grounds Decal Art Pack 2

The Decal Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Brad Bound. They have been optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new custom decal feature. This art package is specifically designed to help set the mood during play by changing the decal displayed on the FG desktop.
These images can also be used as handouts or integrated into other image creations inside of Fantasy Grounds.

This pack includes:

  • Over 100 custom decal images and effects, places and locations, items, and more.
"
detailed_description:
" This product requires Fantasy Grounds Unity

Fantasy Grounds Decal Art Pack 2

The Decal Art Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Brad Bound. They have been optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the new custom decal feature. This art package is specifically designed to help set the mood during play by changing the decal displayed on the FG desktop.
These images can also be used as handouts or integrated into other image creations inside of Fantasy Grounds.

This pack includes:

  • Over 100 custom decal images and effects, places and locations, items, and more.
"

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
